title: Distill setup article added
description: The first Distill how-to article is up in the Meta section.
contents:
The first article about using Distill to build a website like this one is now up in the Meta section. More articles are coming!
Note: the source for this site can be found on github.

title: PS753 Glossary underway
description: Starting a section I've been planning for a while
contents:
One of the things I want to have in the Academics section of the site is glossaries of terms from some of my classes, with the hope that they will be useful to others (as well as myself), and to also make it possible for people to add/correct/amend them. The latter is now possible via GitHub, where the complete source for this site can be found (hit the GitHub icon in the menu in the top right).
The glossary for PS753, Political and Social Networks, is underway with terms from week 1.

title: New blog under construction
description: We're re-launching slinberg.net using Distill. Stand by!
contents:
This is a re-launch of slinberg.net, using the distill platform to align with the UMASS DACSS program I am presently enrolled in.
Pardon the dust while we redecorate. First up will be a soup-to-nuts, zero-to-hero walkthrough of how this site was built and deployed on a custom domain with GitHub.
